import"./projects.css";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Showdown from"showdown";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const[buttonPressed,setButtonPressed]=useState(null);// to track what project we're looking at
const[readMe,setReadMe]=useState(null);// to track what readme to load
const[link,setLink]=useState(null);// to track what hyperlink to load
useEffect(()=>{// onLoad set readme to skribblio's
setButtonPressed("skribblio");setLink("https://github.com/ycheuk/skribblio");},[]);useEffect(()=>{let currReadMe;if(buttonPressed=="cvweb"){fetch("./readMes/cvweb.md").then(cvweb=>cvweb.text()).then(md=>{const converter=new Showdown.Converter();currReadMe=converter.makeHtml(md);setReadMe(currReadMe);setLink("https://github.com/00eemsy/my-cv-website");}).catch(error=>{console.error("error fetching readme: ".concat(error));});}else if(buttonPressed==="skribblio"){fetch("./readMes/skribblio.md")// fetches skribblio project's readme from public folder...
.then(skribblio=>skribblio.text())// ... md file ➡️ md text/raw md ... 
.then(md=>{const converter=new Showdown.Converter();// ... uses Showdown to convert raw md ➡️ raw html ... 
currReadMe=converter.makeHtml(md);setReadMe(currReadMe);// ... and then updates the state variable with the raw html!
setLink("https://github.com/ycheuk/skribblio");}).catch(error=>{// just in case
console.error("error fetching readme: ".concat(error));});}else if(buttonPressed==="feud"){fetch("./readMes/feud.md").then(feud=>feud.text()).then(md=>{const converter=new Showdown.Converter();currReadMe=converter.makeHtml(md);setReadMe(currReadMe);setLink("https://github.com/00eemsy/google-feud");}).catch(error=>{console.error("error fetching readme: ".concat(error));});}else if(buttonPressed==="grimtern"){fetch("./readMes/grimtern.md").then(grimtern=>grimtern.text()).then(md=>{const converter=new Showdown.Converter();currReadMe=converter.makeHtml(md);setReadMe(currReadMe);setLink("https://github.com/00eemsy/csci-121-projects/tree/main/adventure");}).catch(error=>{console.error("error fetching readme: ".concat(error));});}else if(buttonPressed==="stats"){fetch("./readMes/stats.md").then(stats=>stats.text()).then(md=>{const converter=new Showdown.Converter();currReadMe=converter.makeHtml(md);setReadMe(currReadMe);setLink("https://github.com/00eemsy/csci-121-projects/tree/main/stats%20and%20chats");}).catch(error=>{console.error("error fetching readme: ".concat(error));});}},[buttonPressed]);// only runs when the button is clicked
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects",id:"projects",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"pixel",children:"*\u0A48\u208A\u02DA"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cursive",children:"P"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"pixel",children:" ROJECTS"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flexy",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{onClick:()=>setButtonPressed("cvweb"),children:["\u2315 ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("u",{className:"pixel",children:"MY CV WEBSITE"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{onClick:()=>setButtonPressed("skribblio"),children:["\u2315 ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("u",{className:"pixel",children:"SKRIBBL.IO"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{onClick:()=>setButtonPressed("feud"),children:["\u2315 ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("u",{className:"pixel",children:"GOOGLE FEUD"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{onClick:()=>setButtonPressed("grimtern"),children:["\u2315 ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("u",{className:"pixel",children:"GRIMTERN"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{onClick:()=>setButtonPressed("stats"),children:["\u2315 ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("u",{className:"pixel",children:"STATS & CHATS"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link,className:"pixel",children:"\uD83D\uDD17 link to this project's github repository!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:readMe},className:"pixel scroll-box"})]})]})]});};export default Projects;
